A

abort() - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Handler.Operations
Aborts execution and unwinds the stack.
abort() - Static method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Handlers
A handler body that aborts execution.
AbortException - Exception in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Thrown to indicate the desire to interrupt signal processing and unwind the stack until captured.
AbortException() - Constructor for exception org.sbrubbles.conditio.AbortException
Creates a new instance.
apply(Restart.Option) - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts.Resume
Resumes have no meaningful value to "return"; so this method returns a "garbage" object, to be ignored.

C

call(Supplier<T>, Restart<?>...) - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
Evaluates body, providing additional restarts for it.
cast(Object) - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies.ReturnTypePolicy
Casts an object to the class or interface in this policy.

Marks this instance as closed.
close() - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
Updates the scope nesting when execution leaves the try block, and marks this scope as closed.
Condition - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Represents an unusual situation, which the running code doesn't know how to deal with, but the code that called it might.
conditionType(Class<C>) - Static method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Signals
Creates a predicate which checks if a signal holds a condition compatible with the given type.
create() - Static method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scopes
Creates and returns a new instance, nested in the (now former) current scope.

E

equals(Object) - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts.Resume

H

handle(Class<SubC>, BiFunction<Signal<C>, Handler.Operations, Handler.Decision>) - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
Establishes a new handler in this scope, which matches on any conditions compatible with the given type, and runs the given body to produce a result.

Establishes a new handler in this scope.
Handler - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Handles conditions, producing the result to be returned by signal.
Handler.Decision - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio
How a handler decided to handle a condition.
Handler.Operations - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio
The ways a handler can handle a condition.
HandlerNotFoundException - Exception in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Thrown when no working handler for a given condition was found.

I

N

org.sbrubbles.conditio - package org.sbrubbles.conditio
Holds an implementation of a simple condition system.
org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies - package org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies
Defines ways to handle certain cases (e.g. no handlers for a condition) in a signal invocation.
org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts - package org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts
Provides some general use restarts and options.

R

Invokes a previously set recovery strategy.
restart(Restart.Option) - Static method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Handlers
A handler body that invokes the restart matching the given option.
Restart<R> - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Represents a recovery strategy.
Restart.Option - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Serves both as input for restarts, and a way to select which restart to use: the earliest-bound one in the stack which accepts it.

Resume<R> - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts
A restart which indicates that execution may proceed "without" returning a value.
resume() - Static method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Restarts

ReturnTypePolicy<T> - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio.policies
